level.heading: Change of name on divorce.
level.text: Upon divorce from the bond of marriage, the court shall, on request of a party who assumed a new name on marriage and desires to discontinue using it, state in the decree of divorce either the birth-given or other previous name which such person desires to use.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-87
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-911.
